remarks: Equality theorem for adder carry.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Sep-2016.)
statement:
hadbid.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
hadbid.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( th <-> ta ) ) $.
hadbid.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( et <-> ze ) ) $.
cadbi123d $p |- ( ph -> ( cadd ( ps , th , et ) <-> cadd ( ch , ta , ze ) ) ) $.
